text: so Net West is a UK- based bank Uh we
look after retail commercial and wealth
customers and we have 19 million
customers So I'm working with Amazon
Connect uh where we've migrated all of
our agents uh onto Amazon Connect across
our telefan estate So what we love about
Amazon Connect is the speed to deliver
and the agility And this year alone we
have designed built and deployed 30 new
self-s served journeys And we've been
able to do that in a matter of three
weeks by using the data from Amazon
Connect We've been able to drive up our
sentiment score in some instances by 22%
through data coaching We've been using
Amazon Q and Nat West to really help our
agents as an agent assistant tool and we
can switch it on experiment and learn
and switch it back off and we've really
found that that can help pull up our
knowledge material So in terms of our
self-s serve journeys that's really been
able to free up some of our agents so
they can have um great conversations
with more complex and customers who are
in financial needs Uh with really great
conversations of helping customers and
the moments that matter
